name: 2048 - Best Game Ever
description:
Play the ultimate fun puzzle game.

Swipe to move the tiles. When two tiles with the same number touch, they merge and added into one.

Join the tiles and get to the max tile that you can.

Features:
- 5 Grid sizes, from 3 x 3 to 7 x 7.
- Stats Screen.
- All the Grids are saved, so you will not lose any progress if you switch from one Grid to another.
- GameCenter Support.
